segments.text: Doctor Ruth's office , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to make an appointment to see the doctor . My name is Randy Horn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see , Mr . Horn ... The doctor's schedule is full today . Would tomorrow be all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I guess I can survive until tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you prefer to come in in the morning or the afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The doctor has an opening at 10:30 tomorrow . I'll put you down for then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , Mr . Horn , see you tomorrow at 10:30 .
segments.speaker: S1
